name: Mushroom Phantasm
description: A bread with a sauteed vegetarian filling. The cooked mixture is folded into rye dough, allowed to rise, and baked. It resembles a real mushroom so closely that, if not for the shallow cuts on its "cap," you'd almost mistake it for the real thing.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mushroom Phantasm
suspicious.description: A bread with a sauteed vegetarian filling. After struggling through the charred crust, you finally get a taste, only to be hit with a muddy, earthy flavor. A few bites in, your head starts to spin... Could this be a new type of poisonous mushroom?
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Mushroom Phantasm
normal.description: A bread with a sauteed vegetarian filling. The cooked mixture is folded into rye dough, allowed to rise, and baked. It resembles a real mushroom so closely that, if not for the shallow cuts on its "cap," you'd almost mistake it for the real thing.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Mushroom Phantasm
delicious.description: A bread with a sauteed vegetarian filling. Its coarse, sturdy crust acts like a solid wall, sealing in the fragrant juices of the tender mushroom filling, creating a rustic yet satisfying taste that unfolds in your mouth.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.
